statements: UPDATE PlayerPerformance SET games_played = 10, total_points = 200 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE PlayerPerformance SET total_points = 150, average_score = 8.5 WHERE player_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE PlayerPerformance SET average_score = 9.5, total_points = 350 WHERE player_id = 101
UPDATE PlayerPerformance SET games_played = 20, total_points = 500, average_score = 8.75 WHERE player_id = 102
UPDATE player_metrics SET total_score = 1000, average_score = 5000 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE performance_analysis SET improvement_areas = 'Communication Skills', development_areas = 'Leadership Skills' WHERE player_id = 456;
UPDATE player_metrics SET total_score = 500, average_score = 75.5 WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE performance_analysis SET improvement_areas = 'Communication Skills, Teamwork', development_areas = 'Leadership, Problem Solving' WHERE player_id = 456
UPDATE player_metrics SET metric_value = 8.7 WHERE player_id = 123 AND metric_name = 'wins'
UPDATE player_scores SET level_completed = TRUE, score = 500 WHERE player_id = 456 AND date_completed = '2022-01-15'
UPDATE player_metrics SET metric_value = 25.6 WHERE player_id = 100 AND metric_name = 'points';
UPDATE player_scores SET score = 500, level_completed = true WHERE player_id = 200;
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 1
UPDATE games SET genre = 'Action' , release_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE game_id = 2
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'John Doe', last_login = '2021-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE player_scores SET score = 1000, score_date = '2021-10-14' WHERE player_id = 123 AND game_id = 456
UPDATE player_info SET age = 25, skill_level = 7 WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE player_training SET skill_area = 'Defense', duration_hours = 2 WHERE player_id = 201;
UPDATE player_info SET age = 25, skill_level = 8 WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE game_scores SET score = 95, date_played = '2022-05-20' WHERE player_id = 101 AND game_id = 1;
